articles.title: Coronavirus was circulating in Italy as early as September 2019, scientists believe - Evening Standard
articles.description: The star of Grey's Anatomy and Killing Eve is on a career roll right now
articles.content:
Covid-19 may have been circulating in Italy as early as September 2019, scientists in the country have claimed.
